channel.title: Projects on Anim Ronald Darko
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Anim Ronald Darko

item.title: Project V: Iris Species Predictor
item.description: Overview This is a web application created using the R Shiny package. Obtained dataset from Dataprofessor’s github repository. Cleaned the data. Obtained the best performing ML model. Hosted the model using the R Shiny package. Link to Github repository Visit Prediction Website

item.title: Project IV: BMI Calculator
item.description: Overview Converted the height to meters(m). Convert the weight to kilograms(kg). Calculated the BMI Link to Github repository Visit Calculation website

item.title: Project III: Forecasting Golf Playability: A Machine Learning Approach to Predicting Optimal Tee Times
item.description: Overview This is a web application created using the R Shiny package. Obtained dataset from Dataprofessor’s github repository. Cleaned the data. Obtained the best performing ML model. Hosted the model using the R Shiny package. Link to Github repository Visit prediction website

item.title: Project II: Diabetes Prediction
item.description: Overview Obtained dataset from Kaggle Visualized the dataset Performed label encoding Obtained the best performing ML model Measured model accuracy Link to Github repository Visit prediction website

item.title: Project I: Employee Retention Insights: Machine Learning Model Prediction
item.description: Overview Obtained and cleaned dataset from online database. Performed EDA on dataset. Obtained effective ML model. Performed prediction using ML model. Measured accuracy of model. Link to Github repository Visit prediction website
